name: Bug Hunt (Finde_bow)
description:
Bug Hunt is a wave based shooter. Survive against waves of bugs with just your pistol and your wits.

How To Play

Shoot the bugs that are trying to kill you, but be careful not to use up all your ammo or you will have no way of fighting back.

The bugs will drop ammo and health that will help you in your struggle, don't ask what's in the pie or why the bugs have bullets.

If you don't wanna die stay in the light. Though the bugs like it there too.

Controls

W, A, S, D - To move

Mouse - To aim, You will shot at the location of the mouse on screen.

Left click - To fire

R - To reload

Esc - Pause game
